item.title: About Justin Napolitano
item.description: I strategically aggregate topics and insights from large data sets to better understand political, economic, and legal institutions. Interests: Energy production and logistics Business strategy United States Supreme Court behavior and jurisprudence International financial and commercial regulatory organizations What keeps me up at night: The geopolitics of global fossil fuel dependency

item.title: Contact
item.description: Email justin@jnapolitano.io Phone +18322990372 Twitter @just_napolitano LinkedIn /in/justin-napolitano/ Github /justin-napolitano

item.title: Projects
item.description: journal.jnapolitano.io A collection of my articles and research papers. energy.jnapolitano.io An analysis of spent oil and gas well in the United States in order to identify possible carbon storage locations adjacent to pipelines and ports. freight.jnapolitano.io A review of the United States supply chain and freight transportation network with consideration for petrolium and natural gas transportation. Turkish-Kurdish Analysis Database Manual.
